Website Maintenance

Book Free Consultation

Don't panic. This is not an error page. But you know that feeling you just had? Well, we can help you avoid that on your site.

Keep your web presence strong with site Maintenance!

Your website is the first impression people get about your business do not let it be a bad one.

When someone comes to your site and it looks outdated, has spelling errors, broken links or images, they may leave your site and opt to work with a competing company. Don't let that happen because you are busy running your business and do not have time or are frustrated because every time you got to make changes you forgot how and it becomes frustrating.

The development team at Kaffeinated Kodemonkey takes the frustration out of managing your site and allows you to focus on the day to day operations of your business. You are good at what you do, we are good at what we do. Let us manage your site.

We offer exceptional customer service to keep your website current and running smoothly with 99% uptime.

Contact our team to keep your online business up to date with frequent improvements or changes to your website.

Request changes via email at any time and our development team typically take care of change requests within 48 - 72 hours.

What do you get?

Kaffeinated Kodemonkey beleives in standing by our clients. Therfore all site come with FREE backend support.

  • Montlhy site Backups
  • Security updates and patches to the platform as they come out
  • Our team keeps the CMS platform & theme updated to the most current versions

Contact for edits/updats ect. and will get them done for you.

There is a minimmum of one (1) hour.

With montly monitoring you can rest asure your site is ADA compliant and is listed in the search engines.

You will receive:

  • Unlimited site updates
  • Monthly site scan for broken links or images that may creep up over time
  • Automatice update of Proof of Compliance document attached to your site.
